field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the user account.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the unique username for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ._-

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ,._-!$%/()+#= with up to 128 characters.

field.label: Group Name
field.help: Set the unique groupname for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ._-

field.label: Simultaneous Use
field.help: Set the simultaneous use for the user. its range from 1 to 10. if you want to remove it, leave it empty.

field.label: Description
field.help: Given name, last name, or anything you need to describe.

field.label: IP Address
field.help: Set the IP address the user should receive.

field.label: Routes
field.help: Add routes in CIDR notation, e.g. 192.168.2.0/24. Multiple entries are allowed

field.label: IPv6 Address
field.help: Set the IPv6 address the user should receive.

field.label: VLAN ID
field.help: VLAN ID the user receives, e.g. for 802.1X. Leave empty if you don't know what it is.

field.label: Mikrotik VLAN
field.help: Set the Mikrotik VLAN ID and type attribute. Mikrotik uses own attributes for VLAN assignment and for VLAN type use a value of 0 is fine.

field.label: WISPr Bandwidth
field.help: Set the Bandwidth for WISPr attribute. The value is treated as bits/s.

field.label: ChilliSpot Bandwidth
field.help: Set the Bandwidth for ChilliSpot attribute. The value is treated as kbits/s.

field.label: Login Time
field.help: Set the Login-Time. This can be used by the Captive Portal.

field.label: Max Daily Session
field.help: Set the maximum daily session limit. This can be used by the Captive Portal.
